attributes.action: Give a Bravery medal to Iian Black driver of the Virgin train Derailed on friday 23rd febuary 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the bravery shown by driver Ian Black in staying at the controls of his Virgin Train on friday evening deserves a bravery medal. By staying at his controls to try save lives and minimise injury he suffered seriouse injury himself. I believe the fearlessness he showed is an inspiration to us all.
